data.comment: The match has started, with Den Haag kicking-off.
Queensy Menig scores to make it 0-1 at Cars Jeans Stadion.
In the minute 41, Great play from Vaclav Cerny to set up the goal.
Rob Dieperink blows to end the first-half.
The second half is underway in Den Haag - Enschede with the kick-off.
In the minute 58, Aleksandar Rankovic is making the team's first substitution at Cars Jeans Stadion with Samy Bourard replacing David Lennart Philipp.
The home team have replaced Ilay Elmkies with John Goossens. This is the second substitution made today by Aleksandar Rankovic.
Goal! Danilo extends Enschede's lead to 0-2.
In the minute 66, Bilal Ould-Chikh is replacing Nikos Karelis for Den Haag at Cars Jeans Stadion.
Aleksandar Rankovic (Den Haag) is making a fourth substitution, with Amar Catic replacing Andrei Ratiu.
Den Haag make their fifth substitution with Michiel Kramer replacing Jonas Arweiler.
In the minute 76, Julio Pleguezuelo blunders with an own goal. This makes it 1-2.
Jayden Oosterwolde (Enschede) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Halil Dervisoglu is replacing Vaclav Cerny for the away team.
In the minute 86, Samy Bourard is on target to level the scores at 2-2.
Michiel Kramer with an assist there.
The away team have replaced Jesse Bosch with Luka Ilic. This is the second substitution made today by Ron Jans.
In the minute 87, Gijs Smal is on a sub for Jayden Oosterwolde for Enschede.
Goal! The away team take a 2-3 lead through Danilo.
That's full-time at Cars Jeans Stadion. The final score is 2-4.
Ron Jans is making the team's fourth substitution at Cars Jeans Stadion with Leeuwen Thijs Van replacing Queensy Menig.
Leeuwen Thijs Van puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-4.
Luka Ilic instrumental with a fine assist.
